item.title: Compound Interest Calculator
item.description: Compound Interest Equation Used: The inspiration for this user interactive calculator was based on https://www.nerdwallet.com/calculator/compound-interest-calculator. I wanted to create this calculator to learn how compound interest works rather than simply plugging in the numbers into a website. This web application allows the user to adjust the same parameters as on the website: Initial deposit Contribution amount Contribution frequency Years of growth Estimated rate of return It also shows a scatter plot showing the total balance after each year with and without compound interest.
